Hi, I'm '''Marco Meoni''' and I'm an italian ubuntero!

I'm computer engineer and now I'm studing for specialistic degree in computer engineering at <nowiki>[[http://www.ing.unifi.it|University of Florence]]</nowiki>. I'm studying with <nowiki>[[Lizardking]]</nowiki>, a Ubuntu user and my friend.

At the moment I'm a Kubuntu User, as you can see in my Launchpad profile.

I'm a member of the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-it-promozione|Ubuntu Italian Promoters Team]]</nowiki>.
